author: cmlenz
msg: Initial implementation of database delegate: based on interface
RDBMSAdapter which simply duplicates the methods from all the stores
and adds a java.sql.Connection argument. I know this isn't elegant, but
it was the most elegant while simple solution I could think of :P

author: juergen
msg: the location header is expected to be utf-8 encoded

msg: 1)  I18N changes for the label header, correct the received encoding.

msg: The utility ID retrieval functions now close their statements in a finally
